message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $20,000. I know that's a great price for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a steal for this product. I could meet you halfway at $15,000, but I can't go any lower than that.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still hoping to keep the price closer to my budget. Could we perhaps discuss a price around $12,000?
